name: Mind What You Build
description:
Is this a real place? Is this just fantasy?..

Welcome to a very calm and strange village... The siege surrounds this place, making dwellers worry and making your heart anxious. You can rebuild the village and find the answers to some secrets. Does this place really exist? Or is it just a dream inside your head?

"Mind What You Build" is our first project for our first itch.io game jam! We used this jam as an opportunity to improve our skills and start telling this story. We are planning that "Mind What You Build" in its current state will be a demo for a bigger city-builder / narrative quest project.

"Mind What You Build" is made with Godot Engine 3.

Programming, graphics and sound design by Incunabula Games.

Godot add-ons used: "Dialogic"  and "Godot Mixing Desk".

Fonts used: free font Paper by Amy Cox, Roboto.

Thank you for your attention! 😊
